Description: This newly renovated 2-bedroom 1-bath apartment near Tufts University offers a modern aesthetic that includes two private decks and outdoor yard space for relaxation or outdoor activities. The apartment boasts large windows that provide plenty of natural light throughout the spacious living room and bedrooms with a lot of closet space. The fully equipped kitchen includes brand new appliances and ample cabinet and counter space. Perfect for students, faculty, and professionals alike, this apartment offers a prime location with easy access to public transportation and local amenities. Enjoy living in style in a sought-after location with outdoor space and parking options.
